name: Bánh Mì
imgAlt: Vietnamese baguette sandwich with pickled vegetables and herbs
instructions: Marinate pork belly in soy sauce for 15 minutes, then pan-fry until cooked.
Slice baguette lengthwise and toast lightly.
Spread mayonnaise and pâté inside the baguette.
Layer the cooked protein, pickled vegetables, cucumber, and jalapeños.
Top with fresh cilantro and serve immediately.
